contents.sentence:
Was the liquid asphalt sealant in accordance with the following:
(a) The sealant shall be a minimum width of 24 in., centered on the joint line, and shall be extended, when necessary, to provide coverage beyond the edge of the pavement corrugation.
(b) The sealant shall be applied onto a dry surface, free of any foreign or loose material, using a distributor in accordance with

.
(c) The sealant temperature at the time of application shall be at least 135°F and shall not exceed 180°F.
(d) The ambient air and pavement temperatures at the time of application shall be greater than 32°F.
(e) The application rate of the sealant shall be 0.03 ±0.01 gal./sq yd for SS-1h or AE-NT asphalt emulsion and 0.15 ±0.01 gal./sq yd for RPE asphalt emulsion.
(f) The asphalt material shall not be diluted.
(g) Areas receiving greater than 0.04 gal./sq yd shall be lightly broomed to reduce the effects of excess sealant on the pavement surface.
(h) The application rate shall be reduced when sealing milled corrugations in accordance with

. The application rate shall be 0.11 ±0.01 gal./sq yd.
(i) The SS-1h or AE-NT sealant shall be cured a minimum of five days prior to applying the permanent pavement traffic markings in accordance with

.
(j) The RPE sealant shall be cured a minimum of 48 h prior to applying the permanent pavement traffic markings in accordance with

.
(k) Where pavement markings are to be grooved in accordance with
, the minimum cure for the sealant shall not apply.
To prevent excess water infiltration and damage

Confirm the followings:
a. [Sealant Width] ≥ 24 in.
b. Applied centered on the joint line
c. Applied on a dry and clean surface
d. 135°F ≤ [Sealant Temperature] < 180°F
e. [Pavement Temperature] > 32°F

f. If asphalt material is:
    i. SS-1h or AE-NT:
        1. [Application Rate] = 0.03 ±0.01 gal./sq yd
        2. (Light broom is needed if [Application Rate] > 0.04 gal./sq yd.)
        3. Curing is needed for a minimum of 5 days prior to applying the permanent pavement traffic markings.

ii. RPE:
        1. [Application Rate] = 0.15 ±0.01 gal./sq yd
        2. ([Application Rate] = 0.11 ±0.01 gal./sq yd when sealing milled corrugations)
        3. Curing is needed for a minimum of 48 hours prior to applying the permanent pavement traffic markings.

g. The asphalt material shall not be diluted.
h. The minimum cure is not applied where pavement markings are to be grooved.
